# noradstats

The goal of the R package `noradstats` is to access Norwegian and international ODA data for internal use in Norad.

## Installation

You can install the package from [GitHub](https://github.com/noradno/noradstats).

``` r
remotes::install_github("noradno/noradstats", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

## Vignette

The use of the package `noradstats` is described in the package vignette.
